title: High-Jacking Jillian: Jacking In
description: The ultimate control of her body was a wet dream come true for him. He was quickly learning how to control her body for some naughty fun. Jillian was feeling the thoughts and emotions Jack was sending through their new linked headphones. These special new devices could read and alter the minds of the users.Reading his mind was a wet dream come true for her. If it meant the total loss of control of her own body to achieve it, well, anything was worth this blissful, truthful insight into his mind and the honest love and desire he held for her.A Mf mind control story with a great HEA.
author: Robert Z. Crown
